name: You are insignificant - NES rom
description:
Welcome to our Team Disposables second Ludum Dare release!

This is a classic NES platformer, with all that entails - coded to run on an actual nes and (shortly to be) brought to you through an emulator. For now, just download the rom and run it in the emulator of your choice.

You are seeking the legend of Quacking Jack's gold. Good luck, traveller!

This is a short game of five stages, each only one room big. I intended to use more stages, and a title screen, however I had to cut them for compression reasons (i.e. I didn't use any).

Hope you enjoy.

Ludum dare page here:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...
